title: HxH in One Piece World - Novel Updates
author: 紫蓝色的猪
description:
When he opened his eyes again, Maude came to the world of One Piece where the weak and the strong.

With 【Hunter’s Notes】, he can strengthen his own strength by hunting the strong.

So, in order to gain a foothold, he looked at the famous figures.

Shichibukai,

Admiral,

Four Emperors,

These long-established powerhouses are likely to be his milestones leading to the culmination.

So far.

In the eyes of the pirate, he is a scourge.

In the eyes of the Navy, he is also a scourge.>
